programme.desc: The Justice League are in a world called Remnant. They have been transformed into teenagers! The heroes of Remnant find their world has been altered.

programme.desc: Captain Joe takes his sons to sea aboard the Redrum, only to witness nature at its rawest. Niko hunts the season's biggest bluefin yet, worth $10,000.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt Renovation (S2)
programme.desc: After years of visiting relatives in Galveston, TX, a couple is ready to find a beach home of their own.

programme.title: Lakefront Bargain Hunt Renovation (S2)
programme.desc: Chris & Jessica have decided to embrace the lake lifestyle and purchase a boat. Can they turn a fixer upper into the retreat of their dreams?

programme.title: Naked And Afraid (S9)
programme.desc: For the first time, two series crew members attempt to survive 21 days in front of the camera. They face relentless swarms of insects and a lack of food.

programme.title: Catching Monsters (S1)
programme.desc: With one week left in the season, the cold weather could push the tuna south at any moment.

programme.title: Man Vs Wild With Bear Grylls and PM Modi
programme.desc: Bear Grylls goes into the Indian Jungles to learn more about what India is doing to protect its vast natural resources and to share some tips on surviving in the wild.

programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: Got The Spot in Gyeongbuk
programme.desc: This program highlights locations that are truly exceptional, blending traditional elements with modern trends. Through the eyes of foreign influencers who thrive on social media, we aim to showcase the unique charm of different regions and generate a wealth of engaging content in this groundbreaking travel initiative!

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best idol groups in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Music Bank
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Queen of Mystery Season 2
programme.desc: Queen of Mystery is back! Housewife-turned-investigator Seolok and passionate detective Wanseung collaborate to solve mysterious cases and cure the hearts of those who were wounded by crimes along the way.

programme.title: Good Luck!
programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true ‘home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Villains Everywhere
programme.desc: A comedy drama about wild and sometimes heart-warming daily lives of the Korean housewife sisters and their family.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: The government launches an anti-drug operation and wants to kill a drug cartel boss. Jeff, a former drug trafficker, is forced to join the police as a secret killer in this operation after being caught. programme.title: CSI S3 E12 - Got Murder?
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Stephen King's IT E04 - Part IV
programme.desc: IT rises from dank, dark places. IT preys on children. IT knows exactly what scares you--and IT never goes away.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E08 - The Boy From The C.C.C.
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S1 E06 - For Your Eyes Only

programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E01 - Frasier's Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S10 E12 - Hothouse
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E08 - The Boy From The C.C.C.
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: CSI S3 E13 - Random Acts of Violence
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E05 - Behind The Wheel
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: England's Stonehenge and the Moai statues of Easter Island have inspired awe for centuries. But will we ever fully understand how and why these ancient sacred structures came to be?

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: Buckle up as host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten sports cars of all time as voted on by a panel of experts. From the Mustang to the Ferrari, which car gets your engine running?

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: When a seller strolls in with a collection of action figures signed by the cast of 'The Walking Dead', will Chum bite? Then, Corey is too cool when a 'Rock n Roll High School' poster comes into the shop.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: Human bones as a 'miracle cure' for gout? Living mummies buried alive? A truly bizarre Victorian way to lose weight—with tapeworms? The stranger side of human nature is revealed in these rituals.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)
programme.desc: When a peg leg pistol, dinosaur bone and a tigers eye skull, promising to ward off aliens, comes into the shop, will the guys sail away with the pistol or dig deep for dinosaurs?

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4)
programme.desc: A cereal executive's bold idea to finance the "Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory" movie will kick-off a sweets revolution that produces some of the most iconic, imaginative confections in history.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: When Chum sniffs out a 1920s Baccarat bottle for Ybry perfume, is an offer crystal clear, or does it make no scents? Meanwhile, Corey weighs the odds on a gambling kit from the 1800s.

programme.desc: On the creepiest, spookiest and craziest night of the year, Mike and Frank come across a collector with a taste for high voltage oddities.

programme.title: Oplan Baleleng
programme.desc: Oplan Baleleng was the name given to a paramilitary group made up of hardened convicts tasked with the rescue of kidnap for ransom victims. In truth though, theirs was a murder mission.

programme.title: Mauna Ka... Susunod Ako!
programme.desc: When Gerry's father Eric dies in the hands of criminal elements, he goes to his father's bestfriend Arthur for guidance.

programme.title: Iligpit si Bobby Ortega, Markang Bungo 2
programme.desc: More of the real-life exploits of the living legend, Col. Bobby Ortega, the military officer whose unorthodox ways of dealing with the lawless continue to sow fear in the hearts of criminals.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Nardong Toothpick
programme.desc: Nardo was a simple student cum bank janitor who was accidentally accused of murder and robbery. The truth was, while he really intended to rob the victim, he had a change of heart.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Walang Karugtong Ang Nakaraan
programme.desc: A widower found a strong resemblance between his late wife and the tutor of his daughter. Naive and very much in love, she obeyed his wishes and only later realized that he was not really in love with her but only with a memory.

programme.title: Tikboy at Pamboy
programme.desc: Tikboy at Pamboy

programme.title: Anabelle Huggins Story, Ruben Ablaza Tragedy
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of pretty Annabelle Huggins was one of the most sensational crimes of the 60's. The movie bit player was kidnapped by jeepney driver, Ruben Ablaza, whom many believed was obssesed with her.

programme.title: Tatlong Mukha ng Pag-ibig
programme.desc: Three different kinds of love stories in one picture, all of them top-billed by Sharon Cuneta.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Alex Boncayao Brigade
programme.desc: New People's Army comrade Ka Romy (Ronnie Ricketts) is assigned by higher command to form an elite hit team to operate in the city. Their group is called the Alex Boncayao Brigade. Meanwhile, the military also mounts an operation to capture the brigade. When will both sides realize that in war, there can be no winners and losers.

programme.title: Bala Ko Ang Hahatol
programme.desc: Gino (Robin Padilla) kills Rudy (Rey PJ Abellana) and brings Rudy's wife Cristina (Nina Sara) to his boss. Still not in her right mind, Cristina re-enacts her traumatic experience and kills the man in the process.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: From Dubai, connecting Asian markets to the European opens - this show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick, Alix Steel and Scarlet Fu break down the day's top stories and trading action around the close.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: What'd You Miss?

programme.desc: From New York and Sydney, the latest news impacting markets, business and finance around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
programme.desc: From New York and Hong Kong, the essential stories from the close of the US markets to the open of trading across Asia.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: On this episode, we meet Vietnamese Nguyen Quoc Dam who works as a nurse in Kashiwa, Chiba Prefecture, as well as Australian William Rhodes, a garbage collector in Musashino, Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japan where he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: AMAMI: Tanaka Isson
programme.desc: Tanaka Isson had a unique gift for portraying Amami Oshima's nature in art. A child prodigy, his career faltered until he moved to the island. Time-lapse footage hints at scenes that inspired him.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Tea"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to tea. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #38 I prefer outside. / To say which of 2 options you prefer, say the name of your choice, and "no hoo ga ii desu."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Bara Kyoushitsu in Kani City, Gifu Prefecture, is a preschool designed to eliminate the number of foreign children who stop attending school because they don't understand Japanese.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We show how NHK WORLD-JAPAN's app now provides disaster alerts in 11 languages, including push notifications for earthquakes, tsunamis, and severe weather.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: 1/156: Transgenders
programme.desc: 1 in 156 Japanese are transgenders. In a society still lacking in understanding, we talk to transgender people about work, marriage, leisure, as they try to live their normal daily lives.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Dewa Sanzan, Mystic Mountains of Prayers.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Hiroshima recently hosted the G7 Summit. A piano sits in an underground shopping area near the famous Atomic Bomb Dome, and players from all walks of life stop by to share their favorite melodies.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve, families in northeast Japan are visited by monster-like figures called namahage. We follow a group of men trying to keep up their proud tradition as the local population dwindles.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The Kawanishi Dainenbutsu Kenbai dance tells the story of restless souls being guided to the Pure Land by the Buddha, in the form of a monkey. In 2022, it became UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

programme.title: Masterpieces of Historic Capitals
programme.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. In Nara, we delve into astonishing Buddhist and Shinto art.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make shiba-zuke pickles. Cucumbers, myoga, and a little bit of ume vinegar make the perfect side dish to go with newly harvested rice.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Arabian wolves live in the Negev Desert in Israel. How and why do they live in such extreme arid lands? We follow this unique canine for an extended period for the first time ever.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Oze National Park contains the largest mountain wetland in Japan. See the beauty of Oze as time-lapse photography makes the flowers and the morning dew come alive.

programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin."

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Furuta Takayuki co-developed an intelligent mobility robot that won a prestigious international design award in 2021. He shares his passion for creating robots that help people.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The highlight of Onabare is nerikomi, which involves the careful wielding of a long, heavy pole. This follows the parade of a portable shrine through the streets with performances along the way.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Gataine Odori is a dance that depicts exhausting land reclamation work carried out in Omuta in the 19th century. A group of elderly women teach the dance to schoolchildren, and keep the story alive.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make gohei-mochi rice cakes. Wrap rice around cedar sticks and grill over charcoal. Spread homemade miso and enjoy the savory taste of autumn.

programme.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

programme.desc: 1 in 50 families have lost a child during pregnancy or soon after birth. A couple who lost their second son when two hours old talks about their grief and sorrow, a topic often not discussed in Japan.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make shiba-zuke pickles. Cucumbers, myoga, and a little bit of ume vinegar make the perfect side dish to go with newly harvested rice.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Tea"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to tea. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Bara Kyoushitsu in Kani City, Gifu Prefecture, is a preschool designed to eliminate the number of foreign children who stop attending school because they don't understand Japanese.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We show how NHK WORLD-JAPAN's app now provides disaster alerts in 11 languages, including push notifications for earthquakes, tsunamis, and severe weather.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan: IZUMO
programme.desc: Oku-Izumo is home to an ancient technique for making the steel used in Japanese swords. We meet a blacksmith who has inherited the tradition, and enjoy local scenery presented in time-lapse images.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Furuta Takayuki co-developed an intelligent mobility robot that won a prestigious international design award in 2021. He shares his passion for creating robots that help people.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The highlight of Onabare is nerikomi, which involves the careful wielding of a long, heavy pole. This follows the parade of a portable shrine through the streets with performances along the way.

programme.title: Masterpieces of Historic Capitals
programme.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. In Nara, we delve into astonishing Buddhist and Shinto art.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: The Kishiwada Danjiri is a 250-year-old festival in which 200 people pull a 4-ton cart at top speed through the streets. Explore the spirituality behind this audacious ritual.

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan:Osaka Dotonbori
programme.desc: Dotonbori, the heart of Osaka's food scene, strives to remain beloved through efforts by its shopping district that include a vegan-friendly cafe, tackling waste issues, and supporting at-risk youth.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Dewa Sanzan, Mystic Mountains of Prayers.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A depression treatment called rTMS is showing promise. It uses magnetic fields to stimulate the brain and may also help to prevent a relapse when combined with antidepressants.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about rikka and shoman, two dates of early summer. The temple chefs teach us how to make kimpira stir fry with itadori and mehari-zushi (eye-popping sushi).

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: On this episode, we meet Vietnamese Nguyen Quoc Dam who works as a nurse in Kashiwa, Chiba Prefecture, as well as Australian William Rhodes, a garbage collector in Musashino, Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The Kawanishi Dainenbutsu Kenbai dance tells the story of restless souls being guided to the Pure Land by the Buddha, in the form of a monkey. In 2022, it became UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Tea"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to tea. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Shimanto is a nature-rich town in Kochi Prefecture. A piano is placed on a park's outdoor stage, and people stop to play from their heart.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve, families in northeast Japan are visited by monster-like figures called namahage. We follow a group of men trying to keep up their proud tradition as the local population dwindles.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #5
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin."

programme.title: Journeys in Japan
programme.desc: In the ancient capital, Nara, Peter MacMillan finds traditional sites and sacred animals. On this program, get to know the real Japan and discover useful travel tips.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Dining With the Chef
programme.desc: Learn how to cook kabayaki, a savory grilled dish. Chef Saito introduces a recipe with mackerel, helping us to enjoy kabayaki and rice at home.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Beware! False Info and Impression
programme.desc: After a major earthquake hits, the father posts a video online spreading a rumor that the quake was "man-made." Of course, this earns a scolding from his daughter, but like always, not much changes.

programme.title: Document 72 hours
programme.desc: A 24-hour laundromat in Osaka is a vital part of daily life for residents from all walks of life. For three days, we asked customers why they wash and dry their clothes there.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Bananas in Japan visit a plantation in one of the country's snowiest regions, and learn how sweetness is carefully developed in large Tokyo warehouses during the import process.

programme.title: Clothes That Transcend Time
programme.desc: Akita / Koike Kazuko (creative director) Nishimonai Bon Odori Festival has continued for over 700 years. Koike finds timeless beauty in the costumes, remade using beloved family kimono.

programme.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: For the very first time, the Barbababies will take the train and sleep in a hotel.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's Pickleworld! The coolest, most pickle-riffic theme park in ALL of Axle City. Too bad Pickle's family got lost on the way there! In their briniest adventure yet, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to rescue the family and bring them back to the park.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Rubble's favorite baseball star Aaron Judge can't get out of town to the home run derby, Rubble & Crew build a stadium to hold the derby right in Builder Cove! // Surf's up for Rubble & Crew! Well, if they can get over the super hot sand, it is.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it on the way to Tico's house. // Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky, but it loses three stars! Dora has to get them back in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe. // Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Gemma Veness for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Flour Power
programme.desc: Prepare your sieves! The internet's favourite foodie Alison Roman, Fico restaurant's Federica Andrisani and Adam unleash their flour power.

programme.title: Australian Story - Episode 12
programme.desc: The power of the personal. Compelling stories about real people that illuminate, entertain and inspire. Presented by Leigh Sales.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A hardened expert thief plans one last heist, but the cop on the case is obsessed with bringing him down.

programme.title: The Ghost And The Darkness
programme.desc: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Two buddies-one blind, the other deaf-go on the run to solve a murder and clear their names.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Before Holly’s husband died, he made plans for her. Over the course of the year after his death, she will receive letters, gifts, and instructions on how to be happy again.

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Biography of children's author Beatrix Potter, including how she overcame a domineering mother and the chauvinism of Victorian England to become a best-selling author.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by the innocence of those who live there, two young people become entangled in the ongoing battle between good and evil.

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: A heart breaking coming-of-age story about a boy's abusive relationship with his new stepfather, and his emotionally scarred mother.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Before Holly’s husband died, he made plans for her. Over the course of the year after his death, she will receive letters, gifts, and instructions on how to be happy again.

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Biography of children's author Beatrix Potter, including how she overcame a domineering mother and the chauvinism of Victorian England to become a best-selling author.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Mr. and Mrs. Fox live an idyllic home life but after twelve years of quiet domesticity, the bucolic existence proves too much for Mr. Fox's wild animal instincts. Director Wes Anderson's adaptation of a beloved children's novel by Roald Dahl.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: When a fugitive couple's glamorous and sometimes deadly adventure erupts into a maze of double-crosses, close escapes, false identities, and head-spinning romantic snafus, they come to realize that all they can count on is each other.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A daring yet reckless pilot who shuns teamwork and the rules of engagement eventually learns the importance of cooperation and discipline. Along the way he has a fiery affair, does some spectacular flying and causes the death of his best friend.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Detectives gather crucial information about a double-homicide from neighbourhood surveillance footage, but they're not able to identify and track the killer until some key digital data is uncovered.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: 18-year-old Kyle Farishian is working the late shift on Halloween when he is brutally attacked by a masked assailant. Surveillance footage helps detectives track down the culprit.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a man is shot dead, pathologist Dr. Antoine Wrice works with investigators to interpret unusual evidence found on the scene and unwind the complex case that could be more than a typical homicide.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: As two more participants enter Pitt County Detention Center, some may already be wavering on their commitment to make it through quarantine.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Gwinnett County, a young man is caught in the crossfire when his twenty-first birthday spins out of control.

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House
programme.desc: A raised toilet seat alerts Kate Flory to an intruder that sends her screaming to the streets. When Samuel Bryan finds blood and muddy footprints, he and his father track down a looming phrogger.

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House
programme.desc: Helena Jayne Bryant notices things missing and stuff misplaced. It takes a sinister encounter with her home invader to make her finally wake up. Next, Brian O'Neill's Seattle condo turns into a war zone.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a beloved pastor's second wife is killed in a tragic car crash, it raises suspicions over the death of his first wife. Her death never sat easy with distinguished pathologist Dr. Wayne Ross.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A young man is arrested for violating a restraining order by sending a text message. While in Virginia Beach, an 18-year-old woman is arrested for assault and battery after a fight with her brother.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Nurse Susan Fortune moves to Albany for a fresh start after being involved in a relationship of domestic abuse. She matches with Jake Embert. The pair hit it off and the relationship moves quickly.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: People in charming Hope Mills, are on edge when a high school freshman vanishes while on her way to meet a friend. When she turns up dead three weeks later, the community rallies to flush out the killer.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Jocelyn, 29, dreams of being Insta-famous. Her family ignores her online addiction, leaving Jocelyn at risk. Nicholas will stop at nothing to achieve his dream of becoming a respected content creator.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: Just a stone's throw from the legendary Paul Ricard racetrack, we meet a surprising young man in a rush, Fabien Ferré, who won three Michelin stars at once, becoming France's youngest three-star chef. Combining seriousness and fun, rigour and relaxation, Fabien Ferré offers virtuoso Provence-style cuisine.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien meets Joanie and Hugues, two former members of the armed forces, just a few days be-fore they set sail for the southern seas. Aboard their catamaran, they plan to spend five years seeking out the finest kitesurfing spots around the globe.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: They are invisible but essential: the dockworkers moor and undock all the merchant ships that enter and leave the ports. Sailors on land, they live on the watch, just like on a ship. In an increasingly automated world, they are an essential link in global maritime trade.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: To win back her friends, Api decides to take matters into her own hands. She talks to Koro, who is willing to help her.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix becomes Chief's apprentice for his new project, making a chest of drawers to store his spare uniform. Finding the plank tree completely bare, Alix teaches him that you can also make planks by cutting down trees.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: Just a stone's throw from the legendary Paul Ricard racetrack, we meet a surprising young man in a rush, Fabien Ferré, who won three Michelin stars at once, becoming France's youngest three-star chef. Combining seriousness and fun, rigour and relaxation, Fabien Ferré offers virtuoso Provence-style cuisine.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquête, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Envoyé Special
programme.desc: In-depth reports, investigations, unseen interviews, detailed profiles, testimonies... The current affairs show that is always on the move, up close to events and all those involved!

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Adieu Berthe - L'Enterrement De Mémé
programme.desc: Armand is kept on his toes by his pharmacy and his passion for magic. Sentimentally, he is torn between his wife, Hélène, and his mistress, Alix, and also has to juggle with his father who has Alzheimer's and his busybody mother-in-law. When his grandmother passes away, he is rapidly overwhelmed.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Anémone still doesn't know whether her illness is hereditary, but Lise tries to persuade her to hire a private detective to track down her children. Despite the love she feels for him, Maryse continues to investigate the women featured in Vincent's notebook.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Going to see her neurologist alone, Anémone receives the results of her genetic test. She announces the result to her children Karla, Simon and Olivia. Caroline learns that fingerprints have been found on the rifle she'd discovered in her childhood home.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: Between Italy, the Queyras and the Embrunais stretches the Ubaye Valley. Still wild and unspoilt, the upper valley is currently seeing a renaissance thanks to the many young people choosing to settle there. Bakers, grocers, farmers: each has chosen a life in tune with their convictions, close to nature.

programme.desc: The comic genius of Louis de Funès (1914-1983) has travelled down the years and lost none of its vitality, as shown by the continuing success of his films many of which have become classics. Personal stories and archive footage of the ''nicest angry man ever'', as Patrice Leconte called him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: It's parent teacher conference night and the Loud parents find themselves endlessly running around from class to class. Lincoln has his heart set on the Banana Split that their parents have promised if the Loud kids get more good reviews than bad.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force's fingerprints show up on crime scene evidence, they must break into police headquarters and wipe the prints, or their secret identities--and Danger Force itself--will be ruined.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry and Charlotte are transported into an opposite universe where Ray and Schwoz are evil and want to destroy Piper. They must stop Evil Ray and Evil Schwoz and figure out how to get back to their universe.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and they're not alone... there's a monster down there with them!

Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?
